import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import './Booking.css'; const apiuser = 'http://localhost:9999/user' const apiBooking = "http://localhost:9999/booking" export default class Booking extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.onSubmitBooking = this.onSubmitBooking.bind(this) this.state= { id: "", create_from : "", create_to : "", room_id: "" } } componentWillMount(){ const config = { headers: { Authorization : localStorage.getItem('token') } } console.log(localStorage.getItem('token')) // api axios นำ email มาแสดง axios.get(apiuser,config) .then( res => { console.log(res) // เซต Email มาแสดง this.setState({ id: res.data[0].id }) }, err => { console.log(err) } ) } onSubmitBooking(e){ e.preventDefault(); const data = { email : this.email, password : this.password, firstname:this.firstname, lastname: this.lastname, birthday: this.birthday, tel: this.tel } axios.post(apisingin,data) .then( res => { console.log(data) console.log(res) alert("สมัครสมาชิกสำเร็จ") window.location.assign("http://localhost:3000") } ).catch( err => { console.log(err) } ) } render() { console.log("render Booking id: ", this.state.id) return (
this.id = e.target.value} /> this.create_from = e.target.value} />
this.create_to = e.target.value} />
{/* { e => this.email = e.target.value } */} this.room_id= e.target.value} /> {/* */}
